name: 女装妹妹从没少过麻烦
detailed_description:
【about】
The text AVG is adapted from the novel "CROSS-DRESSING ANIKI".

【story】
I don't know from when, the relationship between me and her has gradually become estranged.
A flat day, like water, is used to greet and touch the distance.
But no matter how long we live together, the relationship between me and her will not be close to 0.0001 centimeters.
I chewed the most classic sentence in the middle of the fifth of the second, and it seemed to accept the reality.
It's like no one is going to pay attention to his careless weight small stone, where it eventually falls.
Perhaps it is an act of inadvertent, or perhaps a "miracle" filled with water.
Small wonder with the courage of allowing no explanation.
It changed the path of my life and her.

【Characteristic】
A light hearted story
The whole speech
The exquisite color picture
The light novel
The steam achievement

【Publisher】
iQing & Blue Fiddich

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7
  • Processor: Inetel Pentium G4600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX750
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
  • Additional Notes: 此配置已可满足流畅运行，推荐配置看看就行
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: win7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2080ti
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any
  • Additional Notes: 以上配置均为口胡，纯属主催YY

legal_notice:
The game consists of Blue Fiddich group and the joint production of light light novel copyright belongs, piracy.

The story of this game and all the characters, the name of the organization, the place name and so on in the game are purely fictitious.
Any similarity is purely coincidental.
